database.query: INSERT INTO `{table.amun_system_registry}` (`name`, `type`, `value`) VALUES ('my.registration_enabled', 'BOOLEAN', '1'), ('my.max_group_count', 'INTEGER', '12'), ('my.openid_provider', 'STRING', 'googlemail.com, gmail.com, yahoo.com, aol.com, aim.com'), ('table.amun_service_my_attempt', 'STRING', '{config.table_prefix}service_my_attempt'), ('table.amun_service_my_contact', 'STRING', '{config.table_prefix}service_my_contact'), ('table.amun_service_my_notify', 'STRING', '{config.table_prefix}service_my_notify'), ('table.amun_service_my_notify_service', 'STRING', '{config.table_prefix}service_my_notify_service'), ('table.amun_service_my_subscription', 'STRING', '{config.table_prefix}service_my_subscription');

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `{table.amun_service_my_attempt}` ( `id` int(10) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `ip` varchar(40) NOT NULL, `count` int(10) NOT NULL, `date` datetime NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`id`), UNIQUE KEY `ip` (`ip`) ) ENGINE=MyISAM DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8;

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `{table.amun_service_my_contact}` ( `id` INT(10) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `userId` INT(10) NOT NULL, `status` INT(10) NOT NULL, `type` ENUM('EMAIL','XMPP') NOT NULL, `value` VARCHAR(64) NOT NULL, `date` DATETIME NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`id`) ) ENGINE=MyISAM DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8;

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `{table.amun_service_my_notify}` ( `id` INT(10) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `userId` INT(10) NOT NULL, `serviceId` INT(10) NOT NULL, `contactId` INT(10) NOT NULL, `status` INT(10) NOT NULL, `date` DATETIME NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`id`), UNIQUE KEY `serviceContactId` (`serviceId`,`contactId`) ) ENGINE=MyISAM DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8;

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `{table.amun_service_my_subscription}` ( `id` int(10) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `userId` INT(10) NOT NULL, `status` INT(10) NOT NULL, `hub` VARCHAR(256) NOT NULL, `topic` VARCHAR(256) NOT NULL, `leaseSeconds` INT(10), `secret` VARCHAR(40), `verifyToken` VARCHAR(32), `date` DATETIME NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`id`) ) ENGINE=MyISAM DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8;
